SEARCH
Package org.example.library.services

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
org.example.library.services.BookService
public class BookService extends Object
Service class responsible for handling all operations related to books: searching, borrowing, fines, overdue detection, reminders, and observer notifications.

This class communicates directly with the FileDatabase to read and update book information.

    • findBookByISBN

      public org.json.JSONObject findBookByISBN(String isbn)
      Finds a book in the database by its ISBN.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN code of the desired book
      Returns:
      a JSONObject containing the book data or null if not found

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(Observer observer)
      Registers an observer that will receive notifications.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer to register

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver(Observer observer)
      Removes an existing observer from the notification list.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer to remove

    • addBook

      public void addBook(Book book)
      Adds a new book to the database.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book object to register

    • searchByISBN

      public List<Book> searchByISBN(String isbn)
      Searches for a book by ISBN and returns a list of matching results.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN value to search for
      Returns:
      list of matching Book objects

    • searchByTitle

      public List<Book> searchByTitle(String title)
      Searches for books that contain the specified title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title substring to search for
      Returns:
      list of matching books

    • searchByAuthor

      public List<Book> searchByAuthor(String author)
      Searches for books written by a specific author.
      Parameters:
      author - the author name or substring
      Returns:
      list of matching books

    • getAllBooks

      public List<Book> getAllBooks()
      Returns all books stored in the database.
      Returns:
      list of all books

    • checkOverdueBooks

      public void checkOverdueBooks()
      Checks all borrowed books and applies fines using the FineStrategy. If a book is overdue, a fine is calculated based on days late.

    • borrowBook

      public void borrowBook(String isbn, User currentUser)
      Allows a user to borrow a book if available.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to borrow
      currentUser - the user borrowing the book

    • payFine

      public void payFine(String isbn, double amount)
      Allows a user to pay part or all of their book fine.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book
      amount - the payment amount

    • getTotalBookFineForUser

      public double getTotalBookFineForUser(int userId)
      Calculates the total accumulated fine for all books borrowed by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user's ID
      Returns:
      total fine amount

    • getOverdueBooksForUser

      public List<org.json.JSONObject> getOverdueBooksForUser(int userId)
      Retrieves all overdue books for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user's ID
      Returns:
      list of overdue books as JSONObject

    • sendReminder

      public void sendReminder(User user)
      Sends an overdue reminder to a specific user. If the user has no overdue books, no notification is triggered.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to notify

    • sendRemindersToAllUsers

      public int sendRemindersToAllUsers(List<User> users, EmailService1 emailService)
      Sends reminders (real emails) to all users who have overdue books.
      Parameters:
      users - list of users to check
      emailService - service used to send the email
      Returns:
      total number of reminders sent
